name: Gearboxed
description:
You’ve been on Alternia quite a while. Walking through the tall cities on a night with two bright moons overhead. It may have seemed mysterious and unnerving before, but it’s about average for you now.

The dark walls lined with muk and grime have lead you to meeting a few people in the past, after all. Maybe not the most hospitable of your friends, but still people you think of fondly.

As such, you see these ominous alleyways' potential for a light at the end, should you dare to venture down them. A light that may even lead to…
